long_description: we provide taxi and minibus service from corfu airport or port. we are a family business providing taxi and minibus service , located and operating in the north of the island of corfu. all our drivers are licenced professionals from the greek ministry of transport, offering services 24/7we can transfer you from/to corfu airport or port to/from any place in the north of corfu, depending on your demands. we operate mainly in the resorts of sidari , agios stefanos - san stefanos , arillas , agios georgios (pagi) - san george and afionas.
generated_description: corfu holiday taxi is a family-owned transportation service provider based in corfu, ioanian islands. the company offers taxi and minibus services from and to corfu airport and port, primarily serving the resorts of roda, acharavi, sidari, agios stefanos - san stefanos, arillas, agios georgios (pagi) - san george, and afionas. all drivers are licensed professionals from the greek ministry of transport, ensuring safe and timely transportation. the company operates 24/7, catering to various travel demands within the northern region of corfu.
generated_business_tags: licensed professionals | taxi and minibus services | airport and port transfers | transportation services | 24/7 transportation services
